targets.rawSql:
WITH daily_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        toStartOfDay(q.execution_start_time) AS time,
        sum(q.physical_input_bytes) AS bytes_read,
        sum(q.written_bytes) AS bytes_written,
        count(CASE WHEN q.physical_input_bytes > 0 THEN 1 END) AS read_queries,
        count(CASE WHEN q.written_bytes > 0 THEN 1 END) AS write_queries,
        count() AS total_queries
    FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
    WHERE 
        q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
        AND q.environment IN (${env})
    GROUP BY time
)
SELECT
    time,
    bytes_read,
    bytes_written,
    read_queries,
    write_queries,
    total_queries,
    (bytes_read / (bytes_read + bytes_written + 1)) * 100 AS read_percentage,
    (bytes_written / (bytes_read + bytes_written + 1)) * 100 AS write_percentage,
    (read_queries / (total_queries + 0.001)) * 100 AS read_query_percentage,
    (write_queries / (total_queries + 0.001)) * 100 AS write_query_percentage
FROM daily_stats
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
    toStartOfDay(q.execution_start_time) AS time,
    sum(q.physical_input_bytes) AS bytes_read,
    sum(q.written_bytes) AS bytes_written,
    sum(q.physical_input_rows) AS rows_read,
    sum(q.written_rows) AS rows_written,
    count(CASE WHEN q.physical_input_bytes > 0 THEN 1 END) AS read_queries,
    count(CASE WHEN q.written_bytes > 0 THEN 1 END) AS write_queries
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
WHERE 
    q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
    toStartOfDay(q.execution_start_time) AS time,
    q.query_state,
    count() AS query_count
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
WHERE 
    q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND q.query_state != ''
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY time, q.query_state
ORDER BY time, query_count DESC

SELECT 
    toStartOfDay(event_time) AS time,
    sum(source_physical_input_bytes) AS total_bytes_read,
    sum(source_physical_input_rows) AS total_rows_read,
    avg(source_physical_input_bytes) AS avg_bytes_per_query
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_source_tables s
    INNER JOIN `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
    ON s.query_id = q.query_id AND q.environment IN (${env})
WHERE event_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
    toStartOfDay(q.execution_start_time) AS time,
    avg(q.peak_user_memory_bytes) AS avg_peak_memory,
    avg(q.physical_input_bytes) AS avg_input_bytes
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
WHERE 
    q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
    toStartOfDay(q.execution_start_time) AS time,
    avg(q.queued_time) AS avg_queued_time,
    max(q.queued_time) AS max_queued_time,
    quantile(0.95)(q.queued_time) AS p95_queued_time,
    avg(q.analysis_time + q.planning_time) AS avg_planning_time
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
WHERE 
    q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
    toStartOfDay(q.execution_start_time) AS time,
    avg(q.wall_time) AS avg_wall_time,
    avg(q.cpu_time) AS avg_cpu_time,
    avg(q.execution_time) AS avg_execution_time,
    max(q.wall_time) AS max_wall_time,
    quantile(0.95)(q.wall_time) AS p95_wall_time
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
WHERE 
    q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND q.wall_time > 0
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
    q.source AS query_source,
    q.user_agent,
    count() AS query_count,
    sum(q.physical_input_bytes) AS total_bytes_read,
    avg(q.wall_time) AS avg_wall_time
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
WHERE 
    q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND q.source != ''
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY query_source, q.user_agent
ORDER BY query_count DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
    q.query_id,
    q.user AS username,
    q.query_type,
    q.query_state,
    q.physical_input_bytes AS bytes_read,
    q.physical_input_rows AS rows_read,
    q.wall_time AS wall_time,
    q.cpu_time AS cpu_time,
    q.peak_user_memory_bytes AS peak_memory,
    q.execution_start_time
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
WHERE 
    q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
ORDER BY bytes_read DESC
LIMIT 25

SELECT 
    q.user AS username,
    count() AS query_count,
    sum(q.physical_input_bytes) AS total_bytes_read,
    sum(q.physical_input_rows) AS total_rows_read,
    avg(cpu_time) AS avg_cpu_time,
    max(cpu_time) AS max_cpu_time,
    sum(cpu_time) AS sum_cpu_time,
    avg(q.wall_time) AS avg_wall_time,
    max(q.wall_time) AS max_wall_time
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
WHERE 
    q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND q.user != ''
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY username
ORDER BY query_count DESC
LIMIT 25

SELECT 
    q.user AS username,
    count() AS query_count,
    sum(q.physical_input_bytes) AS total_bytes_read,
    sum(q.physical_input_rows) AS total_rows_read,
    avg(cpu_time) AS avg_cpu_time,
    max(cpu_time) AS max_cpu_time,
    sum(cpu_time) AS sum_cpu_time,
    avg(q.wall_time) AS avg_wall_time,
    max(q.wall_time) AS max_wall_time
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q
WHERE 
    q.execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND q.user != ''
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY username
ORDER BY sum(cpu_time) DESC
LIMIT 25

SELECT 
    target_catalog AS catalog,
    target_schema AS schema,
    target_table AS table,
    count() AS write_query_count,
    sum(written_bytes) AS total_bytes_written,
    sum(written_rows) AS total_rows_written,
    max(written_bytes) AS max_bytes_per_query,
    avg(written_bytes) AS avg_bytes_per_query,
    avg(cpu_time) AS avg_cpu_time,
    sum(cpu_time) AS sum_cpu_time,
    max(wall_time) AS max_write_time,
    avg(wall_time) AS avg_write_time
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics
WHERE 
    execution_start_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND target_catalog != ''
    AND target_schema != ''
    AND target_table != ''
    AND written_bytes > 0
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY catalog, schema, table
ORDER BY total_bytes_written DESC
LIMIT 25

SELECT 
    s.source_catalog AS catalog,
    s.source_schema AS schema,
    s.source_table AS table,
    count() AS read_query_count,
    sum(s.source_physical_input_bytes) AS total_bytes_read,
    sum(s.source_physical_input_rows) AS total_rows_read,
    max(s.source_physical_input_bytes) AS max_bytes_per_query,
    avg(s.source_physical_input_bytes) AS avg_bytes_per_query,
    avg(q.wall_time) AS avg_read_time,
    max(q.wall_time) AS max_read_time,
    avg(q.cpu_time) AS avg_cpu_time,
    sum(q.cpu_time) AS sum_cpu_time
FROM `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_source_tables s
JOIN `trino-logs-experiment`.mv_query_metrics q ON s.query_id = q.query_id
WHERE 
    s.event_time BETWEEN toDateTime($__fromTime) AND toDateTime($__toTime)
    AND s.source_catalog != ''
    AND s.source_schema != ''
    AND s.source_table != ''
    AND s.source_physical_input_bytes > 0
    AND q.environment IN (${env})
GROUP BY catalog, schema, table
ORDER BY total_bytes_read DESC
LIMIT 25
